bibl.title: Gold, Granite and Water: The Bir Umm Fawakhir Survey Project 1992. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago, Survey Project 1992. The site can now be identified as a fifth-seventh century A.D. Byzantine gold-mining town. - Pp. 47-49: Terence WILFONG, [Description of the Greek] Graffiti.
bibl.seg: MEYER Carol, Gold, Granite and Water: The Bir Umm Fawakhir Survey Project 1992. Avec résumé en anglais.

Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago, Survey Project 1992. The site can now be identified as a fifth-seventh century A.D. Byzantine gold-mining town. - Pp. 47-49: Terence WILFONG, [Description of the Greek] Graffiti.
